title: Amazon drops its Top 100 Toys list for the 2019 holiday season
text:
CLOSE Amazon’s most anticipated toy list for the holidays is out, and it features many brands that have appeared on previous lists. USA TODAY

With Thanksgiving falling a week later this year, retailers are pushing out their gift lists and deals earlier.

Walmart is launching its online deals beginning at midnight Eastern time on Friday, yes, almost a full week before Halloween.

And Amazon just dropped its Top 100 Toys list for the 2019 holiday season.

The online retail giant notes that the list compiles top trends for the year which include characters from Marvel, Star Wars, Harry Potter, Spiderman, PJ Masks and Paw Patrol, and toys from LEGO, L.O.L. Surprise!, Funko Pop, Barbie, Hot Wheels, Baby Alive, Monopoly and Play-Doh.

Here are 10 under $30 that caught our eye. Check out the full list on Amazon.

10 Amazon top 100 toys under $30

1. WowWee Pinkfong Baby Shark Official Song Puppet, $14.88

WowWee Pinkfong Baby Shark (Photo: Amazon)

2. Crayola Super Art Coloring Kit, $22.13

3. Flappy The Elephant Stuffed Animal Plush, $28.90

4. L.O.L. Surprise! Fluffy Pets Winter Disco Series with Removable Fur, $12.88

5. Disney Frozen Adventure Collection 5 Small Dolls from Frozen 2, $24.99

READ MORE

6. Monopoly Voice Banking Electronic Family Board Game, $23.99

7. Play-Doh Modeling Compound 36-Pack Case of Colors, $24.99

Play-Doh , 36 Pack (Photo: Amazon)

8. Hot Wheels id Rodger Dodger, $6.99

9. Klutz Lego Make Your Own Movie Activity Kit, $15.19

10. National Geographic Mega Slime Kit and Putty Lab, $29.99

Also check out Amazon's list of the Top 25 Toys for 2019.

Follow the latest from USA TODAY Parenting at usatoday.com/life/parenting.

description: Amazon predicts top toy trends for 2019 will include Marvel, Star Wars, Harry Potter, Paw Patrol, LEGO, L.O.L. Suprise, Barbie and more.
